Who We Are

We're Barry Zornes and Sawyer Murphy, two teens from South Shore with a passion for lawn care and hard work. What started as a weekend gig with one mower has turned into a reliable lawn service trusted by our community.

We believe in showing up on time, doing the job right, and charging fair prices. We're proud to serve homeowners and businesses across South Shore, Lloyd, Greenup, and Portsmouth.
